title: Nikki Bella and sister Brie flaunt their toned midriffs as they go shopping for baby clothes in LA
text:
Nikki Bella and sister Brie, both 35, were spotted showing off their taut tummies Tuesday as they shopped for baby clothes in Los Angeles.

Nikki stepped out in a skintight crimson spaghetti-strap crop top, which hugged her tight figure.

Retail therapy: Nikki Bella and sister Brie were spotted showing off their taut tummies Tuesday as they shopped for baby clothes in Los Angeles

It was completed with some distressed baggy jeans, ripped throughout, and a pair of leopard-print heels.

Brie donned a black crop top under an open white button-down shirt with a beaded necklace.

She finished the look in some skintight grey slacks with gold snaps, some black flattop sunglasses and a pair of silver metallic strappy stilettos.

Lady in red: Nikki stepped out in a skintight crimson spaghetti-strap crop top, which hugged her tight figure

Black and white: Brie donned a black crop top under an open white button-down shirt with a beaded necklace

The twins were seen getting iced coffees and shopping at a baby clothing store in Sherman Oaks.

Nikki recently revealed that she's not quite ready for kids with boyfriend Artem Chigvintsev, 37.

She told E! News: 'Oh gosh, no. Marriage and babies are really scary for me right now.'

Not ready: Nikki recently revealed that she's not quite ready for kids with boyfriend Artem Chigvintsev: 'Oh gosh, no. Marriage and babies are really scary for me right now'

Never say never: But the retired pro wrestler clarified that the idea wasn't totally off the table for the future

Epidural please: She recently said on her and Brie's The Bellas Podcast: 'I want a boy and a girl and I want to knock it out all at once. I want an epidural right when I [go] into labor. I don’t want to feel anything. Those are the things I want'

But the retired pro wrestler clarified that the idea wasn't totally off the table for the future.

She recently said on her and Brie's The Bellas Podcast: 'I want a boy and a girl and I want to knock it out all at once.

'I want an epidural right when I [go] into labor. I don’t want to feel anything. Those are the things I want.'

Meanwhile, Brie is already a mommy, sharing daughter Birdie, two, with husband Daniel Bryan, 38.
description: Nikki Bella and sister Brie, both 35, were spotted showing off their taut tummies Tuesday as they shopped for baby clothes in Los Angeles. Nikki stepped out in a skintight crimson crop top.
